name: 伊莎贝尔·艾伦伦德
name_full: 伊莎贝尔·艾伦伦德 Isabel Aerenlund

last_movies.title: 束缚与放纵 第二季
除了我，每个人都有人爱

introduction: Bilingual Mexican cinema, theatre and tv actress. Graduated from The Actors Studio Drama School / The New School for Drama, Nueva York. In theatre she has participantes in plays such as "Allá nos están leyendo", " La sombra de tu sombra", "Extraños en un tren", "Eurídice", "Lejos", just to mention some. In cinema she took part in "Obediencia Perfecta" , "Voy a pasármelo bien" by David Serrano, "Casi una una gran estafa", among others. Estreno en el Festival de Cine de Venecia "No One Left Behind" junto a Danny Huston y escrito y dirigido por Guillermo Arriaga, como parte de la Selección Oficial; así como en el Festival Internacional de Cine de Morelia. Some of her tv projects stand out such as "Los Artistas" for VIX+, "Señorita 89" by Starsz Play, "Ingobernable" Netflix , "Hasta que te conocí" , among others. We Will soon be able to see her in "The Containment" by Zagha Brothers and in "A million miles away" playing the character : Nicole Stott together with Michael Peña, directed by Ale Marquez Abella.
